sub_title: Sr. Int. Projectmanager & Photographer @ I AM HARDSTYLE
summary:
Music, photography, travel and sports have always played a big role in my life. After finishing my Sports, Management & Business studies I traveled and worked in various countries around the world and gained experience in International projects. At the moment I am working as a projectmanager and photographer for DJ Brennan Heart and his I AM HARDSTYLE brand.

As a represent of the Dutch dance industry, Brennan Heart is one of the leading brands in international hardstyle music. With his remarkable harmonious melodies, catchy vocal lines and an impeccable production Brennan Heart has been part of the scene for over two decades and has been part of the DJ Mag Top 100 for over 10 years now. It's clear that he is here to stay. As photographer of DJ Brennan heart I'm in the lucky position to travel the world and capture the life and shows of Brennan Heart at the most iconic venues and places around the globe.

Brennan Heart founded his brand I AM HARDSTYLE in 2015 and has ever since brought together thousands of people across the globe with his I AM HARDSTYLE events, uniting those who love the harder music styles. As projectmanager of I AM HARDSTYLE I am responsible for organizing, exploiting and expanding the brand and it's shows worldwide. An example of I AM HARDSTYLE shows are the ones in Zurich, Switzerland, in Warsaw Poland and the mainstage take over at Dreambeach Festival in Spain this year. With all these events I AM HARDSTYLE Reaches an incredible amount of fans worldwide every year.

Being able to combine my big passion for music, photography and travel makes this job feel like everything but a job. Interested to hear more or interested in the I AM HARDSTYLE brand? Feel free to reach out!

T: +316-13862364
E: Koen@iamhardstyle.com
W: www.iamhardstyle.com
Instagram: @10k_photograph 

My areas of expertise: Photography, (international) projectmanagement, projectlead, production, directing, managing and helping improve teams and it’s individuals.

profile_positions.description:
As projectmanager of I AM HARDSTYLE responsible for organizing, exploiting and expanding the brand and it's liveshows. With 35 shows organized all over the world in the past 5 years I AM HARDSTYLE is considered one of the biggest worldwide brands in the harder electronic music genre.

Next to projectmanagement of the I AM HARDSTYLE shows I am responsible for the photography of DJ Brennan Heart around the world, capturing the life and shows of Brennan Heart at the most iconic venues and places around the globe.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Int. Projectmanager & Photographer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for International projects mainly. Example of these projects are festivals such as the first and second edition of SAGA Festival in Bucharest, Romania, but also the debut show of Secret Project Festival in Amsterdam, together with American Partner Insomniac.

Also assisted as projectmanager in the last phase of the first edition of Secret Project presents Pula Music week in the iconic, over 2000 years old, Pula colosseum in, Pula, Croatia. With an amazing 7 day line up with the biggest names in house and techno. Line up consisting out of superstar names Peggy Gou, Solomon, Disclosure, Tale of Us, Boris Brejcha, Charlotte de Witte and Black Coffee.
profile_positions.title: Senior Projectmanager

profile_positions.location: Ouderkerk aan de Amstel, Noord-Holland, Nederland
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for projects such as:

- ISU European Single Distance Championships 2020, Thialf, Heerenveen, the Netherlands.
- European Soccer Championships (EURO 2020) fan- and viewing zone tender in cooperation with Tribe Company.
- Dutch National Soccer League (Eredivisie) Champion Trophy Ceremony season 2018-2019.
- ISU World Championships Sprint 2019, Thialf, Heerenveen, the Netherlands.

Besides these, and several other, projects responsible for the management and planning of the whole events team, organizing 100+ events year round.
profile_positions.title: Head of Events

profile_positions.location: Ouderkerk aan de Amstel, Noord-Holland, Nederland
profile_positions.description:

- ISU World Allround Championships 2018 on "De Coolste Baan van Nederland" in the Olympic Stadion, Amsterdam.

- KPN National Championships Single Distances 2017-2018 & 2018-2019, Thialf, Heerenveen.

- HomeRide & HomeRun 2018, commissioned by Ronald McDonald House Charities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Projectmanager

profile_positions.title: Freelance Photographer & Producer
